DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Sarcoidosis rare systemic granulomatous disease mainly affect young middle age adult , severely affect African Americans Caucasians . The etiology sarcoidosis yet know , epidemiological study identify general risk factor include age , sex , race , family history . Sarcoidosis may also influence environmental factor , although particular environmental agent yet clearly define . While previous study provide evidence familial clustering , little know gene influence predisposition sarcoidosis . DESIGN NARRATIVE : This multicenter consortium genetic epidemiology study . The investigator accomplish goal organize 10-site multi-center consortium recruit adequate sample sarcoidosis family analysis . They plan use affected sibling pair linkage analysis scan genome link chromosomal region , transmission disequilibrium test evaluate candidate gene region evidence linkage , environmental questionnaire collect data test possible interaction susceptibility gene exogenous risk factor . Genotyping analysis data schedule begin July , 2001 completion analysis April , 2004 . The study consist Clinical Core , Data Coordinating Core , Genetics Core DNA Processing Center Genotyping Center . Eight ten clinical center comprise Clinical Core member ACCESS , A Case Control Etiology Sarcoidosis Study .
